title: Can People Stop Bitching About GP Being Disabled

replies.body:
Some people want an engaging story, others just want to grind ranked.
This is more about the difference and confrontation between these two groups.

There can be overlap, but often people just pick a side.

This board is not a massive hivemind. Stop thinking it is, it makes you look silly.

Personal opinion: I don't play Gangplank, so I don't really mind him being disabled, but if a champion I enjoyed were disabled for a week I'd probably be upset. If you want lore to periodically remove part of the cast because it's "impactful" then more power to ya, but anything more than two days is just silly.

I think I would be on the other side.
If my main Malzahar got disabled, I would be a little annoyed, but I would be excited about what would happen when he returned storywise.
A week off my favorite champion just to get a skin, A nice bonus. The look on Kassadin's face when Malzahar returns, priceless.
